title: FANTASMAS DIVERTIDOS Halloween
description:
Encontre fantasmas engraçados escondidos em um castelo assustador! Pegue-os quando eles olharem para fora! Este jogo desenvolve atenção e velocidade de reação. É emocionante, e seus filhos vão adorar. Existem 30 fantasmas diferentes neste jogo!
Pegue tantos fantasmas quanto possível e receba recompensas - doces e um bolo assustador! Mergulhe na atmosfera de Halloween agora mesmo!

Mini-jogos adicionais incluídos.
Controle um morcego para evitar se chocar com os fantasmas.
Encontre pares de monstros escondidos nas abóboras!
Alimente cada monstro com uma alimentação adequada!
 
Diversão e aventuras te esperam em um mundo assustador e excitante!
developer: DOG&FROG Educational preschool kids games for girls and boys, toddlers and babies

title: Papa's Pizzeria To Go!
description:
Things get messy when you’re stuck running a wildly popular pizza parlor in Papa’s Pizzeria To Go! Top, bake, and serve pizzas in this award-winning game that’s reimagined for iPhone and iPod Touch.

You'll need to multitask between each area of the pizzeria, with new controls designed to work just right in the palm of your hand.  Head to the Order Station to watch for customers waiting in the lobby.  Switch to the Topping Station to add a variety of toppings to each pizza.  Move to the Bake Station to cook the pizzas in the oven until they're baked just right.  Jump to the Cutting Station to cut the pizza into perfect slices.  Each station is a hands-on experience, where you'll need to drag, swipe, and tap your way through the pizza-building process.

Keep your customers happy to earn more points and level up.  As your level rises, you'll unlock new toppings in the shop, and new customers will start visiting the Pizzeria!  A well-crafted pizza also earns you tips, which you can spend on upgrades and decorations for the lobby!

** NEW FOR PAPA'S PIZZERIA TO GO **

Papa's Pizzeria To Go is redesigned and reimagined for smaller screens, so your fingers don't get in the way of the action!

CONTROL WITH YOUR THUMBS - You'll switch stations using buttons in the corners of the screen, perfect for your thumbs.  You can also use buttons in the top corners to quickly switch Order Tickets, and you can view all of your Order Tickets in a zoomed-in mode for easy reading.

TOPPING STATION - We've completely redesigned the Topping Station for smaller screens.  Bins of toppings can be scrolled with your thumb, which allows us to have many more toppings than in the original game.  Tap on a bin to select that topping, then tap multiple times on the pizza to add items directly onto the pizza.  You don't need to drag individual toppings onto the pizza, so you can top faster than ever!  A quick swipe on the pizza will send it off the to the Bake Station.

BAKE STATION - Papa Louie's coal-fired oven gets an upgrade!  You can buy new Oven Alarms in the Shop to help you keep track of pizzas in the oven.  Simply drag an alarm onto one of the oven timers, and you'll hear an alert when that pizza is cooked just right.  Buy new Oven Boosters to cook your pizzas even faster than before!

CUTTING STATION - When it's time to cut pizzas, simply touch and drag a line across the pizza to decide where to cut.  If you want even more control to fine-tune your slices, you can also cut using multi-touch!  Use two fingers or thumbs to move each end of the line at the same time, and release to slice your pizza.  If you're having trouble cutting pizzas at the right angle, buy a variety of Cutting Guides in the Shop to cut that perfect slice!

NEW INGREDIENTS - We've added a ton of new ingredients which can't be found in the original Papa's Pizzeria.  As you play the game, you'll unlock 26 unique ingredients to serve your customers!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR LOBBY - You can spend your hard-earned tips in the Shop, where you can find a variety of posters, furniture, and wallpaper styles for your lobby!  Use the brand-new Lobby tool to add items to your restaurant, and move and arrange them however you like!  Choose from over 140 customization items, and every item you add to the lobby will improve your Waiting Score for your customers!

UPDATED FEATURES - Serve picky closers at the end of the day, earn paychecks as you play, and try to please the finicky Food Critic to earn a Blue Ribbon!

**GAME FEATURES**

Hands-on pizza shop in the Papa Louie universe
All new controls and gameplay designed for smaller screens
Multi-task between topping, baking, and cutting
Shop to buy upgrades, furniture, and posters using your in-game tips
New Lobby Editor to customize and decorate your shop
90 customers to unlock with unique orders
Challenging Closers and Food Critic
75 in-game achievements to earn

**NOTE FOR iPAD USERS**

Papa's Pizzeria To Go is designed especially for smaller screens.

title: Gatinho - Jogos de Aventura 4+
description:
^‥^ Sem compras no aplicativo. Sem anúncios. ^‥^
Compre uma vez e obtenha atualizações gratuitas para sempre!

"Que legal! O Gatinho é convidado para uma festa à fantasia! ...mas muitos pequenos incidentes o aguardam no caminho até lá. Arrume a mochila do Gatinho para levá-lo com segurança até a festa. Você consegue se lembrar de cada coisa de que ele precisa? Não se preocupe, se tudo der errado, o Gatinho sempre irá sempre voltar para você cuidar dele: tratar seus machucados, limpá-lo e secá-lo, desenhar um mapa pra ele, fantasiá-lo... com sua ajuda, ele vai conseguir!
 
 Recursos especiais:
 
•Divirta-se com 10 adoráveis minijogos onde você poderá cuidar de 'Gatinho ' quando as coisas derem errado:
 
 - Passe talco e escove as pulgas.
 - Seque a 'Gatinho' e coloque seu divertido traje de capa de chuva e botas de borracha.
 - Remova com cuidado os cactos do pelo do gatinho.
 - Trate e enfaixe seus machucados
 - Modele seu jogo de aprendizagem: oh céus, o presente caiu. Você poderia pegar todos os doces e colocá-los de volta na bandeja onde eles deveriam estar?
 - Mostre ao Gatinho o caminho por vários labirintos.
 - Lave a lama e seque o gatinho com a toalha.
 - Dê água e comida para o Gatinho quando sua barriguinha gemer.
 - Tire fotos engraçadas com seu companheiro peludo! Ele pode sentar no seu ombro, esfregar o nariz em você e muito mais!
 - Fantasias criativas: misture e combine todos os tipos de acessórios e roupas para criar sua própria fantasia para a festa!
 
 • Escolha seu próprio caminho para a festa, influenciando o enredo da jornada de Gatinho.
  
 • Diversão a longo prazo e Jogos da Memória: toda vez que se lembrar dos itens da mochila, você ganha um ""Peixinho dourado"". Com ele, você pode desbloquear mais fantasias incríveis, como: Dinossauro, Gato Safari, Leão e, finalmente, Super Gato!
 
 • Aspectos de aplicativo de aprendizagem: Jogo da Memória, Quebra-cabeças, Labirinto, Design criativo de fantasias.
 
 Para crianças maiores de 4 anos

Squeakosaurus

title: Fru-fruta - Receitas Saudáveis
description:
Acesse as melhores receitas do blog e preparos exclusivos de forma prática e rápida. Receitas saudáveis e inclusivas, perfeitas para quem tem restrições alimentares ou quer melhorar e manter uma alimentação mais leve.

No app você encontra mais de 80 receitas infalíveis da pela Pati Bianco, criadora do Fru-fruta e autora de 3 livros best-sellers! Todas livres de leite (lactose) e ovos, com muitas opções sem glúten, veganas, sem açúcar e lowcarb.

O aplicativo foi pensado para facilitar seu dia, portanto a navegação é simples e intuitiva. Você pode filtrá-las por:

Refeição (café da manhã, lanche, almoço/jantar, sobremesas)
Restrição alimentar (sem leite, sem glúten, sem ovos, sem açúcar, vegano, lowcarb)
Por ingrediente (ex: chia, cacau em pó, farinha de amêndoas, quinoa e muito mais)

Você também pode salvar as suas receitas favoritas para manter uma lista organizada a um toque de distância! 

Receitas exclusivas:
Manjar de coco com calda de caramelo (vegano, sem glúten)
Sorbet de manga com cobertura durinha de chocolate (vegano, sem açúcar, sem glúten)
Muffin de chocolate com framboesa (vegano, sem glúten)
Abóbora assada com balsâmico e mel (sem glúten, sem leite)
Tortinha snickers (vegano, sem glúten, sem açúcar)
Spaghetti de pupunha com molho cremoso de avocado (vegano, sem glúten, lowcarb)
Torta de chocolate maravilha

E algumas receitas exclusivas dos livros:
Barrinha de nuts caseira (vegano, sem glúten, sem açúcar)
Brownie Fru-fruta (o melhor do mundo!) (vegano, sem glúten)
Cuca integral de banana (vegano)
Bolo de cenoura (vegano)
Fudge crocante (vegano, sem glúten, sem açúcar)
Cookies integrais de amêndoas (vegano)
Chocotone integral com cranberry e pistache

Na categoria “bases” você encontra preparos como o caldo caseiro de legumes, como cozinhar e conservar quinoa e grão-de-bico, como preparar leites vegetais (aveia, castanha e amêndoas), como preparar e conservar biomassa de banana verde e molho branco sem leite de vaca.

Além de muitas outras receitas deliciosas!

Tudo para facilitar e trazer muito mais sabor e saúde à sua rotina!

title: Toca Hair Salon 2
description:
Corte, faça cachos, pinte e penteie - da forma que quiser!

Nosso aplicativo de sucesso Toca Hair Salon está de volta em uma versão ainda melhor, com novos personagens, novas ferramentas, novos acessórios e ainda mais diversão com penteados!

Nesse aplicativo supercriativo para crianças, você cuida de seu próprio salão de cabelereiro, com quatro personagens divertidos. Corte, pinte e penteie da forma que quiser, usando várias ferramentas diferentes - de um pente e tesoura simples a uma chapinha e um babyliss. Apare bigodes, levante moicanos cor-de-rosa e dê a alguém os cachos que desejam!

Ops - você acidentalmente cortou cabelo demais? Acerte-o com nosso tônico especial G.R.O.W. e adicione acessórios divertidos, como chapéus e óculos. Quando você e o cliente estiverem felizes com a aparência, não se esqueça de levá-lo à cabine para tirar uma fotografia!

O que há de novo no Toca Hair Salon 2?
- 6 personagens totalmente novos
- Novas ferramentas: lâmina, babyliss, frisador e chapinha
- Efeitos de spray colorido mais realistas - combine-os para criar novos tons!
- Novos acessórios: chapéus, óculos e muitos mais
- Novos cenários para fotografias
- Animações suaves e belas
- Penteados melhores e mais realistas - faça o penteado que desejar!

Outras características que você reconhecerá do Toca Hair Salon:
- Corte e apare o cabelo com o aparador elétrico e a tesoura
- Lave o cabelo com xampu, chuveirinho e toalha
- Use o secador para conseguir a aparência certa
- 9 cores de cabelo para escolher e combinar
- Vários acessórios para dar o toque final
- Use a poção mágica G.R.O.W para fazer com que o cabelo cresça novamente
- Os personagens fazem caras e sons divertidos enquanto você os penteia
- Nenhuma regra nem estresse - jogue como quiser!
- Interface para crianças
- Sem propagandas de terceiros
- Sem compras dentro do aplicativo


***

SOBRE A TOCA BOCA
Na Toca Boca, acreditamos que brincar tem o poder de despertar a imaginação das crianças e as ajuda a aprender sobre o mundo. Desenvolvemos nossos produtos a partir da perspectiva das crianças para permitir que sejam alegres, criativas e quem elas querem ser. Nossos produtos incluem apps vencedores de prêmios que foram baixados mais de 130 milhões de vezes em 215 países e oferecem uma experiência aberta, divertida, e segura para jogar. Saiba mais sobre a Toca Boca e nossos produtos em tocaboca.com.

POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDADE
Privacidade é uma questão que levamos muito a sério. Para saber mais sobre como trabalhamos com essas questões, leia a nossa política de privacidade: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

title: Cytus
description:
**Bem-vindo ao Cytus Musical World** 

VEM SENTIR A MÚSICA E A ARTE, O RITMO E O SOM! 

Consulta as imagens e verás o mais ESPECTACULAR jogo de música para iOS de sempre! 
JOGA e DIVERTE-TE! 

*CARACTERÍSTICAS*

- Mais de 200 músicas e mais de 400 variações, incluindo muitas de compositores de renome de todo o mundo
 
- Ilustrações apelativas desenhadas à mão (tal como ilustrado nas imagens) 

- Sistema de Linha Activa fácil e intuitivo e 3 tipos de notas 

- Os diferentes modos de exibição permitem jogador pré-visualizar as notas facilmente 

- As fortes batidas e ritmos oferecem uma experiência satisfatória para o jogador 

- Mais de 9 níveis de dificuldade para mais diversão e desafios 

- Vários géneros musicais: POP, JAZZ, TRANCE, HARDCORE, DRUM 'N BASS e muito mais 

- Integração com as Tabelas de classificação do Center Leaderboards: Desafia jogadores de todo o mundo!

- Liga-te ao Facebook e mostra a tua destreza no Cytus 

*COMO JOGAR* 

- Segue a Linha Activa 

- Toca em cada nota à medida que a linha passa 

- Toca exactamente quando a linha estiver no centro da nota para obteres uma maior pontuação! 

*HISTÓRIA* 
Num futuro distante, os únicos seres sensíveis no mundo são robôs. 
São o último vestígio do espírito humano. 
No entanto, a humanidade não desapareceu por completo. 
Existe tecnologia capaz de transferir memórias para este robôs. 
Mas com espaço limitado, as novas memórias irão substituir gradualmente as mais antigas. 
Para evitar que as emoções nas memórias humanas desaparecessem, os robôs tiverem que converter as emoções em músicas e armazená-las num local chamado Cytus. 
Os robôs utilizam estas músicas para sentirem as emoções humanas e sonharem que cada um deles possui almas... 

Cytus 
-------------------------------------------------- 
Site Oficial do Cytus: www.rayark.com/g/cytus 
Site Oficial da Rayark: www.rayark.com
Follow Cytus https://twitter.com/CytusRayark
Like   Cytus http://www.facebook.com/rayark.Cytus

title: Things 3
description:
Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals.

Best of all, it’s easy to use. Within the hour, you’ll have everything off your mind and neatly organized—from routine tasks to your biggest life goals—and you can start focusing on what matters today.

“Things offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.”
—Wirecutter, The New York Times


KEY FEATURES

• Your To-Dos
Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do—each a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps.

• Your Projects
Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There’s also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule.

• Your Areas
Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion.

• Your Plan
Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :)


MORE THINGS TO LOVE

As you dive deeper, you’ll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few:

• Reminders — set a time and Things will remind you.
• Repeaters — automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set.
• This Evening — a special place for your evening plans.
• Calendar integration — see your events and to-dos together.
• Tags — categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists.
• Quick Find — instantly find to-dos or switch between lists.
• Magic Plus — drag the + button to insert to-dos anywhere in a list.
• Share extension — create to-dos with content from other apps.
• Widgets — see your lists on the home screen.
• Mail to Things — forward an email to Things; now it’s a to-do.
• And much more!


MADE FOR IPHONE

Things is tailored to the iPhone with deep system integrations as well. A great example is the Share extension, which allows you to create to-dos with content from other apps, such as a link to a website you want to get back to.

You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, add widgets to your home screen, create to-dos via Siri, import from Reminders—Things can do it all! There’s even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows.


MADE FOR APPLE WATCH

Things comes with a great app for Apple Watch. Just raise your wrist to glance at your Today list, mark to-dos complete as you go, and dictate new ones on the fly—all synced instantly with your iPhone, iPad, and Mac.


AWARD-WINNING DESIGN

Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection.

“It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.”
—Apple


GET THINGS TODAY

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

• Things is also available for Mac and iPad (sold separately).
• Sync is provided for free via our Things Cloud service.
• A free trial is available for Mac: thingsapp.com

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

title: Hidden Through Time
description:
Hidden Through Time é um jogo fofo de esconde-esconde com objetos espalhados pela maravilhosa história do nosso mundo. Use dicas enigmáticas para descobrir todos os segredos ao explorar as fases coloridas desenhadas à mão.
Ache objetos suficientes para avançar para a próxima fase e passe por todas as quatro grandes eras.

Ainda quer mais ou deseja libertar sua criatividade? Nosso editor está disponível para o público, permitindo você criar suas próprias fases e compartilha-las na nossa nuvem! Aqui também é possível encontrar, jogar e avaliar fases feitas por criadores do mundo todo!

Então junte-se ao Clicky na incrível aventura dele em Hidden Through Time!

title: Ultimate Forest Simulator
description:
Dash into your newest adventure as a ferocious Bear, speedy Rabbit, or a deadly Cougar! Choose from TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS! Hunt down food in the rocky mountains, raise your family, and unlock exciting new playable animals as you experience life in a beautiful yet dangerous Forest!

Download the Ultimate Forest Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Brand New Features
REALISTIC SIMULATOR
You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy while ruling over the Forest!

TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS
Choose from your favorite species of forest animals in a single game! Become a Bear, Rabbit, Turtle, Cougar, Bat, Deer, Raccoon, Squirrel, Snake, and a Hawk! Each species has their own families, experience, and levels!

DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES
Test your skills against SIX thrilling boss battles! A massive tusked beast awaits in the frozen peaks! A legendary reptile awaits you in the coastal caves!

BUILD YOUR FAMILY
Dominate other animals or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any animal in your pack and create a powerful family!

RAISE YOUR BABIES
Breed babies that will grow into powerful members of your family! Care for you babies while they are are young, finding food for them and carrying them in your mouth!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ANIMAL
Choose your animal’s name, appearance, skills, and attributes to complement your pack members and become a more powerful group!

LEVEL UP YOUR ANIMAL
Gain experience by catching and eating your prey, escaping predators, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your animal to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your stats, and increase the size of your pack!

EARN STAT POINTS
Stat Points can be used to provide bonus’s to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Run Speed, and much more! 

UPGRADEABLE BUFFS
Buff Points can be used to upgrade your Hiss and Roar Buffs, which create temporary Stat Boosting auras around your animal when active! 

RAGDOLL PHYSICS
Your prey now realistically dangles from your jaws as you carry them!

DYNAMIC WEATHER, SEASONS AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, and stars! And the BRAND NEW changing seasons!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT
Explore a world so big we created TWENTY FOUR unique dens for your animals to live in! Catch salmon from a  sparkling river, climb the arctic peaks, and explore the dark caves on the coast!

DOZENS OF ENEMIES
Hunt down animals like deer, rabbit, boar, wolf, crow, snake, fish, duck, raccoon, bat, sheep, lynx, alligator, cougar, squirrel, owl, frog, fox, moose, bear, hawk, skunk and many more!

OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS
If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the BRAND NEW blood effects for added combat ferocity!

GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE
With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Ultimate Forest Simulator to transport yourself into a dense wild world with hidden dangers and live the life of your favorite wild animal!

If you liked living in the Forest then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Ultimate Cat Simulator and live as a wild feline in the city, or try the Ultimate Wolf Simulator and howl at the moon with your pack of wolves!

Give us a shout and let us know what you want to play next!
facebook.com/glutenfreegames
twitter.com/glutenfreegames

title: MQTT Terminal Pro
description:
INTRODUCTION:
- MQTT Terminal is used for testing pub/sub protocol with MQTT
- Simply create a MQTT connection with broker and test MQTT messaging
- With this app, You can control any MQTT enabled IoT devices and monitor sensors with pub/sub protocol.

FEATURES:
- Save broker list
- Separate panels for subscribe and publish data
- Custom your own buttons for frequent publishing of same data.
- Monitoring receiving data as ASCII or HEX.
- Publish Data as ASCII or HEX.
- Auto send commands at timed interval
- Selection for \r \n at the end of sending data.
- Send Log file of Subscribed and Published data.
- Keep Screen on/off option.

title: Full Throttle Remastered
description:
Lançado pela LucasArts em 1995, Full Throttle é uma aventura gráfica clássica do lendário Tim Schafer. O jogo conta a história de Ben Throttle, o líder brigão da gangue de motoqueiros Polecats, que se vê metido em uma história de motos, massacres e morte.

Agora, 20 anos depois, Full Throttle está de volta em uma edição remasterizada, com novos gráficos feitos a mão e em 3D de alta resolução, além de áudio e músicas remasterizadas.

Os jogadores podem alternar livremente entre os modos clássico e remasterizado, mesclando as versões de áudio, gráficos e interface como desejarem. Incluímos também um navegador de arte conceitual e uma trilha comentada pelos criadores originais do jogo!

title: Implosion
description:
Trazendo uma experiência de jogos de console AAA para dispositivos móveis.
 
 Vinte anos depois da derrocada da Terra, os membros remanescentes da raça humana estão mais uma vez diante da ameaça da extinção. Chegou a hora de justificar a sua existência. Uma misteriosa forma de vida conhecida como XADA se prepara para lutar contra a última arma da humanidade: o traje de batalha Warmech série III.
 
 Recursos: Fantásticos gráficos de qualidade de console. Produção de áudio e dublagem em nível de Hollywood. Partituras orquestrais completas arranjadas pelo engenheiro da trilogia "O senhor dos anéis" e ganhador do Grammy Award John Kurlander. Vivencie a interface de toque de usuário mais intuitiva já vista neste tipo de plataforma.
 
 Um amplo arsenal de armamentos de tecnologia avançada à sua disposição. Aprimoramentos através do sistema Nuclear ARK dinamizado. Torne-se a última palavra em fusão entre Homem e Máquina. Garanta a sobrevivência da espécie!

title: Wind Tunnel -- for iPhone
description:
Turn your iPad/iPhone into a wind tunnel simulator ! 

Draw obstacles and watch the fluid flow around. Experiment with different sizes, shapes, aerodynamic profiles and see what happens !

Wind Tunnel -- for iPhone is the extended version of the Wind Tunnel Free app. It adds visualization modes (turbulence, fluid direction), vga output, ability to load and save scenes, share scenes by email, rotate obstacles, adjust friction and viscosity and many more features. 

Full feature list include :

• 4 actions : interact with the fluid, draw obstacles, draw smoke sources, use eraser tool. 
• visualization modes : particles (streamlines, streaklines and random), colored smoke (predefined stripes, streamlines and custom), pressure field, speed norm visualization, curl (visualize turbulences), velocity field (visualize speed direction) combined with speed norm or curl. 
• Load/save scenes, share scenes by email, import obstacles shapes as png files. 
• Rotate/move obstacles, pause simulation with gestures. 
• Adjust physical parameters : fluid viscosity, obstacle friction, wind tunnel input speed.
• Predefined scenes : airfoil, cars, rocks, Kármán vortex street…


The Wind Tunnel app lets you create beautiful wind tunnel scenes, play with the fluid and understand physics effects. 
Fluid motion is computed by solving Navier-Stokes equations, at high definition (50000 grid cells) thanks to optimized code taking the most out of CPU performance.

This version does not work on iPad. For iPad buy Wind Tunnel -- for iPad.

title: QuickReader - Leitura Dinâmica
description:
O tecnologia de leitura dinâmica número 1 na Terra. (E talvez até em Marte.) De romances campeões de venda a livros de instruções, automelhoria, relatórios comerciais e outros, nosso software comprovado guia—e treina—seus olhos para ler num ritmo rapidamente acelerado. 

LEIA ATÉ 2-3X MAIS RÁPIDO, ESTILHO SUPER-HUMANO 

Defina sua velocidade de leitura de 10-4000 palavras por minuto e continue desafiando seu próprio tempo. Com alguns toques, o aplicativo acelera e você pode sempre controlar sua velocidade. A maioria das pessoas estão chocadas com a eficiência que elas têm quando ainda estão processando e retendo informação! (Você pode ler normal, também, caso queira.) 

TUDO PERSONALIZÁVEL (ATÉ ISSO) 

De esquema de cores de designer a fontes; margens a interface, o aplicativo cede à sua vontade com toda preferência, tornando esta a “pele” perfeita sobre a qual você lerá todos os seus livros, não importa a velocidade. 

PILOTO AUTOMÁTICO SEM TOQUES (TAMBÉM CHAMADO DE MODO LANTERNA) 

Com Tecnologia de Leitura Guiada, você define a velocidade e as páginas passam para você. E a melhor parte? Os ganhos que você têm no aplicativo passam para leitura normal, sem guia. Acrescente um mordomo e um queijo sofisticado e você poderá estar feito na vida. (Ou pelo menos ter uma boa vantagem sobre toda a humanidade.) 

ACESSO BÔNUS: 2 MILHÕES DE LIVROS, GRÁTIS! 

Livros são o nosso mundo—e temos uma família inteira de aplicativos dedicados a amantes dos livros. Isso significa que também podemos lhe trazer todos os tipos de acesso a títulos gratuitos que outros aplicativos de leitura dinâmica não podem. Oba, oba, viva!

title: Numberblocks: Hide and Seek
description:
From the multi award-winning animators and producers of BAFTA nominated pre-school learning favourites Alphablocks and Numberblocks, we bring you Numberblocks Hide and Seek.

As seen on Cbeebies.

This app helps your child get to grips with addition, number bonds and other key number skills. Find the hidden Numberblocks, add them together and see what happens. 

● Every time you get to Ten, you win something new to play with.

► Play hide and seek! Tap on the Numberblocks when they poke their heads out.

► When you have found two Numberblocks, drag one on top of the other to start the number magic. 

► Predict what will happen when you add them together - if you don’t know, take a guess.

► Make the number magic happen yourself: drag both Numberblocks into the white shape. Watch the number magic happen.      
                  
► Keep finding more Numberblocks and adding them on until you make a Ten.               

► An animation plays to celebrate every time you make Ten.         

► You will also discover a new interactive plaything in the park. Try playing with it!

As you keep playing, the sums get gradually harder and the Numberblocks try out new number shapes. This helps children get better at recognising amounts on sight. If a Numberblock looks unfamiliar, try counting their blocks!

Keep going to fill the park with playthings. After discovering all 20, you can restart the game and play again. Repeat play is a great way to get better at your number bonds and predicting which Numberblocks you will make.

title: Portabilidade Brasil
Haunt the House: Terrortown
description:
Um belo jogo side-scrolling de ação e enigmas estrelado por fantasmas!

... O que foi aquele barulho? Tem alguém aí? 

Deixe os salões empoeirados de uma torre de relógio abandonado para assombrar o seu caminho por uma cidade na calada da noite! Possua objetos com sua alma fantasmagórica e espante pessoas de museus, hospitais, cinemas e até de um navio cruzeiro. Você será capaz de assustar todo mundo e recuperar o que foi perdido antes da noite acabar?

title: Through the Ages
description:
The official adaptation of Vlaada Chvátil’s strategy classic, the second best board game ever according to the Board Game Geek website.

“If you are looking for a civ game, this is the game! This is one of the best games of all time.” – Tom Vasel, The Dice Tower

“Through the Ages is simply phenomenal.” – Drew Massey, Giant Fire Breathing Robot

This is your chance to make history. You begin with a small tribe. As you expand your farms and mines, you lay the groundwork for technological advancements, better governments, and grand wonders. Your military might supports your political skill as you guide your civilization to greatness.

OVERVIEW:
- One of the greatest board games of all time.
- Hundreds of cards to build a mighty civilization. 
- Many paths to victory.
- Manage your resources carefully.

FEATURES:
- Learn the game rules with a funny and engaging tutorial.
- Compete with your friends online or on the same device.
- Defeat clever computer opponents of various skill levels.
- Play with the original board game rules or a streamlined digital version.
- Enjoy single-player Challenges requiring different strategies.

Czech Games Edition has produced over 20 board games and expansions, including many award-winning titles for enthusiastic players: Alchemists, Dungeon Lords and Tzolk'in to name just a few. We expanded into the realm of digital board games with Galaxy Trucker and now with this Through the Ages adaptation.

Download the Ultimate Farm Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Brand New Features

EIGHT PLAYABLE ANIMALS
Choose from your favorite species of farm animals in a single game! Become a Pig, Cow, Goat, Sheep, Chicken, Mouse, Donkey, and Pony! Each species has their own families, experience, and levels!

DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES
Test your skills against SIX thrilling boss battles! A crafty predator lurks among the wildflowers! A dangerous feathered foe will challenge your fighting skills!

BUILD YOUR FAMILY
Dominate other animals or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any animal in your pack and create a powerful family!

RAISE YOUR BABIES

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ANIMAL

LEVEL UP YOUR ANIMAL
Gain experience by finding food, escaping predators, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your animal to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your stats, and increase the size of your pack!

EARN STAT POINTS
Stat Points can be used to provide bonus’s to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Run Speed, and much more! 

UPGRADEABLE BUFFS

DYNAMIC WEATHER, SEASONS AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, and stars! And the BRAND NEW changing seasons!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT
Explore a world so big we created TWENTY unique dens for your animals to live in! Cozy up in the upstairs of the barn, crawl under hay bails, or enjoy ocean views by the water!

DOZENS OF ENEMIES
Hunt down animals like deer, rabbit, boar, wolf, crow, snake, fish, duck, raccoon, bat, sheep, alligator, cougar, squirrel, owl, frog, fox, bear, hawk, skunk and many more!

OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS
If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the BRAND NEW blood effects for added combat ferocity!

GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE
With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Ultimate Farm Simulator to transport yourself into the quiet country and live the life of your favorite barnyard animal!

If you liked living on the Farm then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Ultimate Cat Simulator and live as a wild feline in the city, or try the Ultimate Wolf Simulator and howl at the moon with your pack of wolves!

Give us a shout and let us know what you want to play next!

title: Mirror para Amazon Fire TV
description:
Aplicativo para espelhar tela e áudio do seu iPhone ou iPad para uma TV Amazon Fire. Você pode compartilhar qualquer aplicativo do seu iPhone ou iPad na sua Fire TV.

Antes de usar este aplicativo, por favor acesse o site da Amazon e instale (grátis) o Mirror Receiver para Fire TV: http://bit.ly/am-firetv

Ao se usar o aplicativo,  há alguns segundos de latência (geralmente entre 1 e 2). Portanto, esse espelhamento não é adequado para jogos.

No entanto, o aplicativo é super conveniente para assistir filmes, fazer apresentações, ver fotos e muito mais!

Como o app funciona:

1. Verifique se o seu iPhone ou iPad está conectado à mesma rede local que a sua Fire TV. Não use várias VLANs ou sub-redes.

2. Inicie o aplicativo Mirror para Fire TV. Ele começará a procurar suas Fire TVs na rede local. Quando a sua TV for encontrada, a selecione.

3. Ative as notificações deste aplicativo. Fique tranquilo. Não enviaremos spam para você. Mas usaremos notificações para informar se a sua TV está funcionando corretamente ou não. Então, por favor, selecione esta opção. Caso contrário, você não saberá quando algo não estiver funcionando como deveria.

4. Clique em Start Mirroring para iniciar o espelhamento na Fire TV selecionada. Depois disso, você pode simplesmente acessar qualquer outro aplicativo no seu iPhone ou iPad e o espelhamento continuará sendo executado.

5. Para parar o espelhamento, há duas opções: (1) clique na barra superior vermelha que você verá no seu iPhone ou iPad. (2) Acesse o aplicativo Mirror para  Fire TV e clique em Stop Mirroring.

Limitações e problemas conhecidos:

DRM

Alguns aplicativos bloqueiam o espelhamento de tela. Isso significa que desenvolvedores de aplicativos podem escolher se desejam ou não bloquear o espelhamento de tela. Por exemplo, Netflix, Disney e AppleTV + decidiram bloquear essa opção.

Há um teste simples que você pode fazer para verificar se o aplicativo que você deseja espelhar bloqueou o Screen Mirroring:

Abra esse aplicativo específico e deslize até o Centro de Controle no seu iPhone/ iPad. Em seguida, clique em Gravação de Tela e comece a gravar a tela no rolo da câmera. Assista ao aplicativo que você deseja espelhar e, em algum momento, pare a gravação da tela. Em seguida, acesse o aplicativo Fotos e assista ao vídeo que foi gravado. Se o vídeo gravado mostra o aplicativo que você deseja espelhar, ele funciona bem. Se o vídeo estiver vazio, o aplicativo que você deseja espelhar não permitirá o Espelhamento de tela.


Sobre Gravação de Tela e Privacidade

Mesmo havendo notificações sobre a gravação de tela, não gravamos sua tela em arquivos e não enviamos nenhum conteúdo para um servidor. Armazenamos apenas dados temporariamente na memória, antes de serem transmitidos para a TV. Após a transmissão, o conteúdo é removido da memória.

Suporte:
Se você tiver alguma dúvida ou quiser nos dar um feedback, envie-nos um e-mail ou converse conosco em nossa página no Facebook.

Não se esqueça de dar uma classificação positiva se você gostou do aplicativo! Um agradecimento antecipado de toda a nossa equipe de desenvolvimento!

Envie-nos um feedback através do  e-mail support@airbeam.tv.

title: Aquarium Camera
description:
LED aquarium lights are brilliant, but blue (actinic) light interferes with your camera sensor, changing the beautiful colors of your fish and corals into a scene from a black light filled roller rink from the 1980's.

Enter our hopeful hero, Aquarium Camera. It dreams of ridding the internet of bad aquarium photography. It's designed to color correct the actinic light from LEDs in real-time on our mobile devices, the thing we use to take photos of everything else in our lives, except our tanks... until now. 

"The Aquarium Camera app is an essential tool for reef tank photography." – ReefBuilders.com

You can now stop buying pro camera rigs, shooting in raw, buying gels, and turning off your blue lights to get great and accurate shots of your tank. You don't need to spend hours in post-production or photo editing apps, tweaking the hue and lighting of each of your photos. Simply put, all you need is the Aquarium Camera and an iPad or iPhone to get GREAT photos and videos of your aquarium. 

“So easy to use…  Love it!!!  And the color changing is realtime so you can see the screen and the real thing side by side to ensure you get the right balance.” 
– Carlos Chacon, IT Manager at CoralVue

Features:

• Real-time white balance color
• Real-time RGB adjustment
• *NEW* Real-time Gel mode - orange gels are typically used by professional photographers to compensate for blue light. The new gel mode works like magic by simulating what a gel over your lens will do to your shots. It goes a step further by dynamically changing it's color based on what it sees in your shot (it's like buying millions of gels and picking just the right one for each shot)
• Take Photos or Video
• Portrait and Landscape photos (obviously)
• Digital pinch to zoom
• Touch to focus
• Manually control brightness
• Toggle the flash on/off (works great if your corals are really close to the glass in your aquarium)
• Download it one time and use on your iPad and iPhone
• Quickly access your camera roll to review shots
• Share photos or videos right from the library

Special thanks to the members of Reef2Reef.com for testing version 3.0 of the app! Over 250 aquarists tested version 3.0 prior to pushing to the app store. Check out the Reef2Reef, ReefCentral, Nano-Reef and ChicagoReefs forums to see some of their awesome aquarium photos! Super big thanks to Reef2Reef members Jason Mack, Scott Nelson, Scurvy, NorthFLreefer, ReeferMadness80G, Budau18 and Stratru362 for giving me permission to use their photos in the preview!

I created the Aquarium Camera app because I was tired of seeing posts of brilliant aquariums on forums like Reef2Reef, Nano-Reef, ReefCentral that don't truly represent the health and beauty of the fish, plants, and corals inside. It wasn't as big of a problem in the days of VHO, Power Compacts and Metal Halide lighting, but with LEDs now taking over the aquarium lighting space, we needed another solution. 

Let's commit ourselves to spending less time trying to correct the lighting on our aquarium photos and videos and more time enjoying our fish, shrimp, snails, plants, and corals... oh, and doing water changes.

The before and after shots in the preview were taken at the 2017 Aquatic Experience Kessil booth, A80 Tuna Blues. The video was taken under an AquaIllumination Nano LED fixture.

title: Vocabulary in Use Elementary
description:
________ 
English Vocabulary in Use Elementary Activities provides 120 interactive activities designed to help boost your confidence along with your vocabulary skills. 

Whether you're studying on your own or in class, English Vocabulary in Use Elementary includes all the words and phrases you need at elementary level to understand and be understood in English. This new app is adapted from the English Vocabulary in Use Elementary CD-ROM to make activities even more useful and accessible. 

Features of the App

120 interactive activities

title: Teach Your Monster to Read
description:
Teach Your Monster to Read is an award-winning phonics and reading game that’s helped millions of children learn to read.

• Parents have seen significant improvements in their children’s literacy within weeks.
• Teachers claim it’s a wonderful and captivating classroom tool that helps their students learn to read.
• Kids love making their monster and teaching it read. They learn through play.

Children create a monster and take it on a magical journey over three extensive games - meeting a host of colourful characters along the way and improving their reading skills as they progress. 

• Covers the first two years of learning to read, from matching letters and sounds to enjoying little books.
• Designed in collaboration with leading academics and game designers.
• Complements all synthetic phonics programmes used in schools.
• Suitable for school and home use.
• Includes all 3 games! First Steps, Fun With Words and Champion Reader!

The game is rigorous and works with any phonics scheme so it’s perfect for use in school and at home. It’s developed in collaboration with leading academics at the University of Roehampton. 

The app is commonly used in preschool, primary school, kindergarten and first grade as an interactive teaching resource. 

PART OF THE USBORNE FOUNDATION CHARITY
Teach Your Monster to Read has been created by Teach Monster Games Ltd. which is a subsidiary of The Usborne Foundation. The Usborne Foundation is a charity founded by children’s publisher, Peter Usborne MBE. Harnessing research, design and technology, we create playful media addressing issues from literacy to health. 

TOP FEATURES
• Complements Phases 2-5 of UK Government-approved Letters and Sounds and other major systematic synthetic phonics programmes.
• Absolutely no in-app purchases, hidden costs or in-game adverts. Perfect for kids!
• Suitable for ages 3-6.
• Designed in collaboration with reading experts from Roehampton University.
• Available on iPad and iPhone.

REVIEWS FROM TEACHERS AND PARENTS
"This game is the absolute best quality phonics game I have come across for educational and fun value."
Marie Lewis, Rochdale

“My class have reaped loads of benefits from using the programme and the difference in some of their reading skills has been dramatic."
Maria Andrews, Foundation Phase Teacher

"This is a fabulous game. I'm not kidding when I say that my daughter essentially learned all her letter sounds using First steps, with relatively minimal input from me! Great for parents to practise their letter sounds too."
Eleanor Jones

Teach Monster Games Ltd is a subsidiary of The Usborne Foundation, a registered charity in England and Wales, charity number 1121957.

title: My Contacts Backup - Fácil, rápido e confiável
description:
Não perca, a melhor maneira de fazer backup e restaurar seus contatos

“My Contacts Backup” é a maneira mais fácil de fazer backup e restaurar todos os seus contatos do seu celular sem se conectar ao computador ou sincronização
Você pode fazer backup de todos os seus contatos com um único toque e enviá-las para si mesmo como um anexo .vcf via e-mail
Todos os contactos podem ser facilmente restaurada a qualquer momento, basta abrir o arquivo .vcf em sua caixa postal com app iOS Correio

【Facilidade de utilização, atender sua necessidade】
- "Easy One Click" por completo backup de todos os contatos
- Ele vai enviar os seus contatos em um formato universal para si ou outras pessoas através de e-mail
- Este aplicativo faz seus contatos, ou simplesmente transferi-los de uma forma simples, concreta de que todos os dispositivos podem ler!
- "Easy One Click" o arquivo vCard para restaurar todos os contatos

【Principais Características】
- Backup offline. Não há necessidade de sincronizar com qualquer servidor ou conectar ao computador. Basta enviar e-mail o arquivo de backup para si mesmo
- Fácil de restauração. Não há necessidade de usar qualquer aplicativo para restaurar o arquivo de backup. Basta tocar no arquivo de backup * .vcf no iPhone, iPod Touch ou iPad Mail Client e restaurar seus contatos gratuitamente
- VCard Import & Export Característica 
- Facilmente transferir contatos entre dispositivos iOS via e-mail 
- Formato de arquivo de backup Contatos: vCard (VCF) ou CSV (Excel) 
- Apagar todos os contatos no Catálogo de Endereços 
- Contatos Ilimitados de backup
- A relação concisa, facilidade de uso 
- Suporte tela Retina 
- Suporte iPhone 6, 6+
- IPad Pro Suporte 
- Suporte iOS 9+
- Universal App. IPhone Suporte, iPod, iPad 
- Multi-linguagem

Não precisa hesitar? Faça o download agora! 
Para descobrir mais vantagens!

【dicas】
Após o envio do arquivo de backup (* .vcf) para si mesmo, por favor, verifique sua caixa de entrada para ver se a mensagem chegou e contém anexo (arquivo de backup). Às vezes, os provedores de e-mail bloquear anexos, se o tamanho do anexo é muito grande. Tente com outra conta de e-mail se possível, enviar seu arquivo de backup.

description:
Corel Draw X6 edition cookbook for beginner

- You can watch courses on the go: video lectures, audio lectures, presentations, articles, and anything inside your course.   
- You can watch your course offline: Save courses for offline viewing so you can watch them while you're on a plane or subway!

title: Wolfram Discrete Mathematics Course Assistant
description:
Taking discrete mathematics? Then you need the Wolfram Discrete Mathematics Course Assistant. This app for discrete math—from the world leader in math software—will help you work through your homework problems, ace your tests, and learn discrete math concepts. The Discrete Mathematics Course Assistant solves your specific discrete math problems on the fly, providing answers to a broad range of subjects.

 - Do function calculations like domain and range, image and preimage, and inverse and growth
 - Compute logic problems like minimal forms, implications, propositions, and bitwise operations
 - Calculate set functions like power set, basic set operations, complement, and Venn diagrams
 - Use the Number Theory section for division, modular arithmetic, prime numbers, special numbers, and integer functions
 - Do sequence computations like summation, product, and limit of a sequence
 - Compute permutation and combinatorics questions, including derangements and permutations of list or finite relations and Pascal's triangle
 - Use the discrete probability section for Bernoulli trial equations and view statistics on coin and dice probabilities or view various distribution given the probability of success
 - View information on basic, named, or custom graphs in our Graph Theory section

The Wolfram Discrete Mathematics Course Assistant is powered by the Wolfram|Alpha computational knowledge engine and is created by Wolfram Research, makers of Mathematica—the world's leading software system for mathematical research and education.

The Wolfram Discrete Mathematics Course Assistant draws on the computational power of Wolfram|Alpha's supercomputers over a 3G, 4G, or Wi-Fi connection.

title: BlendZ
description:
Creativity frequently begins with a brilliant thought, rapidly followed by the frantic scribblings of pencil on paper, often accompanied by thumping's on a calculator. This is where BlendZ began.

I wrote BlendZ to save me time working-out and re-calculating the math for large, widescreen, overlapping (blending) projectors, to make up screens larger than a single projector's image. If you need to work out the math for a wide screen projection surface using multiple projectors BlendZ is for you.

To begin all you need to know is the desired width and height of the projection surface, the native chip resolution of the projectors (or output resolution of the source device) you are planning to use, and the number of projectors you think you need. Then, BlendZ will give you all the information you need. BlendZ works in both Feet and Metres, just choose your preferred flavour of measurement and off you go.

Originally this application was written for the Mac and PC as a tool for the Project Managers of Creative Technology (www.ctinternational.com) and now I have released a mobile version for the iOS. Like the desktop version this will draw out the Grids,full with 8 or 16 step Grey-scale (horizontally or vertically) for ease of line up and if needed send out an information sheet as a PDF.

Currently BlendZ only works out the stuff for a single row or column of projectors, at some point in the near future I plan to expand it to calculate projection arrays.

title: Central Hospital Stories Full
description:
Depressa doutor, temos uma emergência no Hospital Central! Uma mulher grávida está de caminho na ambulância para dar à luz, e tem um paciente esperando no laboratório para fazer diferentes exames médicos para diagnosticar sua doença e curá-lo. Tem muito para fazer!

Central Hospital Stories é um hospital avançado, cheio de atividades e coisas para fazer, onde inúmeras aventuras e histórias esperam por você entre médicos e pacientes dentro de suas instalações cheias de interações e surpresas.

Criado para crianças e não tão crianças entre 4 e 14 anos, mas apropriado para ser desfrutado por toda a família, este novo jogo expande o universo da saga Stories para que você possa se divertir ainda mais. Invente desde histórias do dia-a-dia de um hospital até verdadeiras emergências nestas instalações avançadas.


DESCUBRA UM HOSPITAL AVANÇADO E SUAS INSTALAÇÕES

Um hospital de cinco andares com 8 unidades médicas diferentes, uma recepção, sala de espera, entrada de ambulância e restaurante que você pode visitar e gerenciar como quiser. Crie histórias sobre exames médicos, diagnósticos com raios X e outras máquinas avançadas e cure doenças diferentes.

O hospital inclui uma consulta de médico de família, um veterinário, uma maternidade onde as grávidas poderão dar à luz, cuidados intensivos para crianças e outro para adultos, um laboratório de ponta, uma sala de operações moderna e uma sala de pessoal onde o pessoal do hospital pode descansar e se preparar para o próximo turno.

CRIE SUAS HISTÓRIAS DE HOSPITAL

Com tantos locais, personagens e objetos, você nunca vai ficar sem idéias para suas histórias. Divirta-se ajudando as grávidas a ver o seu novo bebê no monitor de ultrassom e, em seguida, ajudá-las a dar à luz, investigue doenças no laboratório e realize operações urgentes na sala de cirurgia ou viva o dia-a-dia de um médico de família fazendo uma rotina médica a toda a família. Você decide!

CARACTERÍSTICAS

- Infinitas formas de brincar em 5 andares com 8 unidades médicas: consulta médico de família, veterinário, maternidade, cuidados intensivos de criança e outro de adultos, laboratório, sala de operações e sala de pessoal.
- Além da recepção existem várias áreas comuns que você também pode explorar: sala de espera, entrada de ambulância e um restaurante.
- Brinque com 37 personagens de diferentes espécies, idades e gêneros, representando diferentes papéis, tanto pacientes como pessoal do hospital.


Sobre PlayToddlers
 
Os jogos PlayToddlers foram desenvolvidos para serem usufruídos por todos os membros da família, independentemente da idade. Promovemos valores sociais responsáveis e hábitos saudáveis em um ambiente seguro e controlado, sem violência ou anúncios de terceiros.

title: BIN Check: Credit Card Checker
description:
This application can help you to check a credit/debit card to know if it is legitimate. 

Checking BIN Number is an indispensable aspect of the online transaction of your company. It is necessary for you to be able to identify and confirm the identity of the bank or financial institution that will complete and approve the transaction made by your business. For instance, checking bin number allows your card processor to identify the bank that issued the credit card used in the transaction. Thus, the search allows for faster and easier connection with the concerned bank, and this also makes it easier to access important data needed to get the authorization and confirm the credit card transaction.

Features:
- BIN Checker:
You can check the BIN number (the first 6 digits of a credit card). The application will display the information about this number like bank name, card type, card brand, country, website etc.
- Credit Card Validator:
This application can validate a entire credit card number and tell if this number is a valid credit card number or not. Application will also display the card type.

Download the Ultimate Ocean Simulator to thrive in the sparkling blue sea as your favorite underwater animal!

If you liked living under the sea then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Ultimate Wolf Simulator and live a wild life in the forest, or turn the Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator and discover a long lost Prehistoric World of Dinosaurs!

Give us a shout and let us know what you want to play next!
facebook.com/glutenfreegames

title: Chess Sudoku
description:
***** DECEMBER UPDATE *****
15 new Knight puzzles, 85 puzzles total!

-------------------------------------

Presented by Cracking The Cryptic, YouTube’s most popular Sudoku channel, comes a new game that connects two of the world’s biggest mind games: Chess and Sudoku!

How does Chess Sudoku work? Well we’ve taken the classic sudoku game everyone knows and loves and created puzzles with chess-related twists! There are three different types of puzzles in the game: Knight Sudoku; King Sudoku and Queen Sudoku.

In Knight Sudoku, in addition to the normal rules of sudoku (no repeated digit in a row/column/3x3 box) a digit must not appear a chess knight’s move away from itself. This simple extra restriction introduces lots of clever additional logic that makes the puzzle even more interesting!

King Sudoku and Queen Sudoku work the same way: ie it’s always normal sudoku but, in King Sudoku a digit must not be a single diagonal move away from itself; and, in Queen Sudoku, every 9 in the grid acts like a chess Queen and must not be in the same row/column/3x3 box OR diagonal of any other 9!

As with their other games (‘Classic Sudoku’ and ‘Sandwich Sudoku’), Simon Anthony and Mark Goodliffe (the hosts of Cracking The Cryptic) have personally crafted the hints for the puzzles. So you know that every puzzle has been play-tested by a human being to ensure that the sudoku is interesting and fun to solve.

In Cracking The Cryptic’s games, players start with zero stars and earn stars by solving puzzles. The more puzzles you solve, the more stars you earn and the more puzzles you get to play. Only the most dedicated (and cleverest) sudoku players will finish all the puzzles. Of course the difficulty is carefully calibrated to ensure lots of puzzles at every level (from easy through to extreme). Anyone familiar with their YouTube channel will know that Simon and Mark take pride in teaching to be better solvers and, with their games, they always craft the puzzles with the mindset of trying to help solvers improve their skills.

Mark and Simon have both represented the UK many times at the World Sudoku Championship and you can find more of their puzzles (and lots of others) on the internet’s biggest sudoku channel Cracking The Cryptic.

Features:
40 beautiful puzzles from the Knight and King variants
Frequent updates adding new puzzles to enjoy
A large free update adding puzzles from the Queen Sudoku variant
Hints crafted by Simon and Mark!

title: SSH Tunnel - with SOCKS5 proxy
description:
SSH Tunnel is the best and most convenient way to manage SSH tunnels on a mobile device running iOS. 

The application allows you to configure a local socks5 proxy with a private tunnel to your own server.

Main functions and features of the application:

- Local Port Forwarding (works similar to: "ssh -L 80:intra.example.com:80 gw.example.com")
- Dynamic Port Forwarding (SOCKS5 proxy)
- Password, Private Key, 2FA (OTP) authentication
- Supported SSH Keys: ECDSA, ed25519, RSA, PuTTY keys.
- Host Key Fingerprint checking feature
- Connection data transfer statistics
- Connection Export & Import (iCloud Drive and other services)
- Passcode & Face ID protection
- Provides a local URL for a Proxy Auto-Configuration (PAC) file (for WiFi proxy autoconfiguration)
- Idle disconnect timer
- Advanced logging for a debug purpose
- Add free app

You need to have an SSH server configured to use this application.

The advantage of the SSH Tunnel is the ability to fully control traffic redirection. The application allows manual configuration of the PAC (Proxy Auto-Config) file using special rules. For example, redirection depending on the Wi-Fi network to which the phone is connected (home/work), time of day or the address of the requested resource itself.

SSH Tunnel support email: support@mobibean.zendesk.com

title: AstroWorx Astrology
description:
AstroWorx Astrology - THE Astro application for individual natal charts and many other chart types!

With AstroWorx you get an extensive application for Astrology - ideal for the ambitious amateur astrologers or seriously interested people who want to delve deeper into astrology.


General Features:
• Chart types / divisions: natal chart, forecast/transits, "Astro time" (stars at this moment), solar returns, synastry, combine, composite, secondary progression, planets arc direction and degrees‘ direction
• Calculation period from January 1, 1800 to December 31, 2998
• Planets of the solar system (including retrograde) : Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus , Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto
• Asteroids and sensitive points (including retrograde) : Lunar Node, Lilith, Chiron, Ceres, Juno, Pallas, Pholus, Vesta, Vertex, Part of Fortune
• Housesystems: Placidus, Koch, Topocentric, Alcabitius, Equal, Porphyry, Meridian houses, Vehlow, Whole Sign, Campanus, Regiomontanus, Morinus, Krusinski
• Major aspects: Conjunction, Opposition, Square, Trine, Sextile
• Minor aspects: Quincunx, Semisextile, Semisquare, Sesquisquare, Quintile and Biquintile
• Search place of birth and residence online or offline with automatic time zone detection or create your own places
• Interpretations of the famous switzer astrologer Anita Cortesi for natal charts
• "Astro time" - display the stars at this moment; Detecting location with GPS or by own input

Displayed information:
• Chart/Radix drawing
• Aspects as an aspectarian graphic and as a sortable list according to planets, aspects or orbis size
• Positions of all stars separated as planets and houses
• Distribution of the stars in qualities (cardinal, fixed, mutable), energies (male, female), elements (fire, water, earth, air) and quadrants/hemisphares

Interpretations:
• Natal chart - read out of almost 330 texts individual interpretations (English only) (planets in signs and houses, aspects between stars)
• Please note that the complete interpretation texts for birth charts, synastries and transits are only available in German. In English, texts for the birth chart are available. There are no interpretation texts in other languages.

Import / Export functions:
• Share charts as PDF (interpretation texts can not be printed, e-mailed or exported)
• Chart graphic export
• Import or export charts as an AAF file (Compatibility with every astrology program can not be guaranteed)


AstroWorx is no ordinary "Astrology-App". No general texts as they are known from newspapers. Your zodiac sign is more than just Aries, Cancer or Libra. Ascendant, Moon, Mercury , Moon, Venus and Mars describe the facets of your personality. Also the positions of Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune and Pluto in your natal chart are crucial for certain character traits and behavior patterns. The astrological individuality of each single personality is created by the distribution of planets in the astrological housesystem. Get into the world of astrology!

title: BassBox Reflex Pro
description:
An application designed to maximize the performance of a subwoofer in bass reflex.
Calculates the size of the box in Bass Reflex enclosure following:
• BB4 (4th Order Boom Box) / SBB4 (Super 4th Order Boom Box).
• QB3 (Quasi 3th Order Butterworth) / SQB3 (SuperQuasi 3th Order Butterworth).
• C4 (Chebyshev to ugual ripple) / SC4 (4th Order Sub-Chebyshev).
• Maxim Flat.
• Box losses Ql 3, Ql 7 and Ql 15.
• Graphic for Frequency Response, Displacement-L. SPL, Thermally-L. SPL, Max Power SPL and Maxim Excursion.
• E.B.P. (Efficiency Bandwidth Product).
• Full results data: Sensibility Spl, Efficiency Spl, db Peak Level, Fmax, Re Total, Qes Total, Qts Total, Sd, Vd, Cms, Mms, Bxl, Cmes, Rms, Res.
• Calculate Accord in Round or Square form.
• Three correction types for each end of the port.
• Select up to 6 Accord.
• Results of Area, Volume, Length.
Selecting the shape and calculation of the volume of the box. Designs the box in the following forms:
- Cube / Rectangular Parallelepiped
- Triangle Prism
- Wedge
- Wedge2
- Truncated of Pyramid
- Hexagonal Prism
- Cylinder
- Sphere
• Detail of panel measurements to build the case with cut PDFs and cut pattern.
• Tool for calculating the electric resistance of two or more speakers, single or double coil in parallel, series or series / parallel.
• Tool Signal Generator, useful for testing the performance of a subwoofer:
• Control of the single Frequency with the slider from 10Hz to 300Hz, Pink Noise, White Noise, Sweep Frequency 300>10Hz and 10>300Hz, Loop and Gain tones.
• Tool for calculating the Volume of speaker size.
• Saving, sharing or printing projects.
• Customization of projects with the possibility to enter the data of your business.

title: Email Signature Maker
description:
Leaving a lasting impression is hard. Doing it at the end of an email is even harder.

That’s probably why so many of us end up searching for professional email signature examples every time we change jobs, get a promotion, or have a sneaking suspicion that our current sign-off isn’t up to par.

A strong email signature is attention-getting, but professional. It’s not flashy, but it’s not bland either.

With Email Signature Maker, you can generate signature within seconds!

title: All Ears Pro
description: All Ears Pro makes it easier and faster to get horses attention during your photo sessions! Choose a premade sound mix or create and record your own. Choose the duration and speed you would like the sounds to play. Use the sound board feature to play ear catching sounds with quickly with the push of a button.

title: Sudoku Kid
description:
Looking for a great fun game with music for your kids?  Then Sudoku Kid is the one!  With each game freshly crafted to help sharpen your child's logical reasoning!  A great Sudoku for kids with Media Sound!  And all our apps are always Ad-Free!


Sudoku Kid has 3 Sudoku flavors to satisfy whims and fancies of beginning players of all ages:

2x2, 2x3, and 3x2 squares with Media Sound


Additional features:

"Hint" to help improve playing skills
"Solve" animation sequence with Music Bites
AutoSave to resume unfinished game
Tracking of fastest playing time and games played


The "Hint" feature will assist like an expert Sudoku master at your side.  You may find those suggestions a great learning experience to improve playing skills.


The "Solve" feature comes with background music and shows in animation sequence how a game can be solved, but can be stopped any time by tapping any cells or buttons to resume your play.  Each empty cell can also be tapped multiple times to gradually narrow down its valid choice.


Sudoku Kid autoSave always picks up where you've last left off or interrupted during your play.  For your amusement only, your solving time will be occasionally posted whenever a game is solved without the "Solve" feature.


If you enjoy playing Sudoku Kid and feel like playing more challenging Sudoku games, please check out our mini Sudoku and Superdoku, crafted with the same exacting details and care and with games to match desired playing levels.


For a cool, calm, and collected app, please also visit our popular Fishies app that lets you play with a school of fish swimming in coral reef.

title: In and Out Essential CashBook
description:
INTRODUÇÃO:

Este aplicativo irá ajudá-lo a acompanhar suas transações com várias contas para receitas, despesas e transferências.
Adicione todas as contas que considerar necessárias, seja em dinheiro, para o banco ou qualquer outra referência de conta que você queira anotar os movimentos.
É simples de usar e é essencial.



PARA QUEM É ESSE PEDIDO?

Para qualquer pessoa com apenas uma conta, eles precisam ter seu próprio diário para registrar entradas, saídas e transferências e desejam ter resumos e estatísticas sobre eles ao longo do tempo.


Receita "IN":
Adicione, edite ou exclua toda a receita desejada, usando uma exibição dedicada.
Acesse o resumo da receita com estatísticas dedicadas e a lista de transações recebidas.


Saídas "OUT":
Adicione, edite ou exclua todas as saídas desejadas, usando uma exibição dedicada.
Acesse o resumo das saídas com estatísticas dedicadas e a lista de transações de saída.

"TRANSFER"
Adicione, edite ou exclua todas as transferências desejadas, usando uma exibição dedicada.

"contas":
Adicione, edite, exclua todas as contas que você deseja, criando um saldo inicial se desejar e acesse as visualizações de resumo dedicadas de cada conta com suas estatísticas.

EXPORTAÇÕES:

- Exportar todos os dados relacionados ao histórico de transações no formato CSV ou TXT
- Exporte os dados filtrados pelo Relatório Curto por Conta ou Categoria no formato TXT ou HTML e PDF.
- Exporte todos os dados relacionados ao resumo da conta única no formato TXT ou HTML e PDF.
- Exporte todos os dados relacionados à conta do extrato no formato HTML e PDF.
- Exporte todas as transações no formato TXT


Todos os recursos:

- Adicione e exclua ou edite TODAS AS CONTAS QUE VOCÊ QUER.
- Adicione e exclua ou edite TODAS AS CATEGORIAS QUE VOCÊ QUER.
- Defina transações futuras.
- LEMBRETE PARA TRANSAÇÕES FUTURAS.
- Defina as transações recorrentes para "in" e "out".
- Visão geral de todas as contas.
- Visão geral específica por conta única.
- Visão geral específica para entradas e saídas.
- Visão geral específica para transferências.
- Histórico de todas as transações.
- Histórico do tipo de calendário com pesquisa dedicada para dia da data (histórico para dias)
- Exporte dados no formato de arquivo TXT ou CSV.
- Exporte todas as transações no formato TXT
-Exporte todos os dados relacionados à conta do extrato no formato HTML e PDF
- Estatísticas por conta.
- Estatísticas por período.
- Relatório curto com intervalos predefinidos e personalizáveis.
- Extrato da conta atualizado hoje, de data para data, escolhendo conta (estatísticas)
- Exportar relatório para arquivos TXT e HTML ou PDF.
- Touch ID
- ID da cara
- Atalho 3D Touch
- Gráficos cativantes
- Um lindo Dark - Mode
